1371: Wolbrand was born in Bloemendaelse straet in 1371.
1384: Lost father at the age of 13.
Lost father at the age of 13.
1385: Lost sibling Alene in 1385 when Alene was 3.
1386: Lost sibling Folkero in 1386 when Folkero was 8.
1391: Got married to Oda at age 21 in 1391.
Wolbrand moved to Corte gracht.B.0 after marriage.
1392: Had a daughter with Oda, Vreile, at age 21.
Lost mother at the age of 21.
1394: Lost sibling Ricmoden in 1394 when Ricmoden was 19.
1395: Lost his wife Oda while she was giving birth to Ryccie in 1395.
Became caretaker of Vreile, Ryccie at age 25.
1396: Got married a second time to Oderada at age 26 in 1396.
Had Oderada move in at Corte gracht.B.0 after marriage.
1397: Lost sibling Waldrada in 1397 when Waldrada was 25.
1398: Had a daughter with Oderada, Oderada, at age 27.
1399: Lost sibling Lielde in 1399 when Lielde was 24.
